item.title: Knights Peak VP of Publishing Talks Importance of Goals and Experience
item.description:
Highlights

  • Knights Peak brings innovation while connecting with players on a familiar level. Quality, personality, and familiarity are the key pillars of its games.
  • Knights Peak's commitment to partnerships shines through with Mandragora, a gothic soulslike RPG inspired by Irish folklore.
  • Eugenio Vitale's vast experience and deep relationships in the industry position Knights Peak for success and future growth.

In June, mobile developer MY.GAMES announced its new premium label, Knights Peak, with a slate of games including Starship Troopers: Extermination , as well as narrative games like Pathfinder: Kingmaker and Mandragora . The company’s foray into premium publishing is built on partnerships throughout the industry.

With more news teased for Gamescom in late August, Game Rant was able to do a deep dive into what makes Knights Peak stand out with the label’s Vice-President of Publishing, Eugenio Vitale. Vitale carries a lot of those partnerships and history, and he has a real passion for Knights Peak’s mission.

The Vision For Knights Peak

Each developer, publisher, or contributor to games has their own DNA, the fingerprint that makes their work stand out as their work. For Bioware it’s branching narratives, for Bethesda, it’s project scale; for Square-Enix it’s high expectations and impressive physics. Knights Peak is a very new label, so the unique style of a Knights Peak game has yet to coalesce.

That doesn’t mean there’s nothing to say about what makes something a Knights Peak project. Vitale explained what values the label takes into its nascent catalogue, forming the beginning of that signature style.

We believe that our games should embody three key pillars: personality, familiarity, and quality. Each title should bring something new to the table within its genre, offering innovation while still allowing players to connect with the game on a familiar level … At the heart of Knights Peak lies a steadfast commitment to partnership. We believe in fostering eye-to-eye relationships with developers and players alike. We have a deep appreciation for the sacrifices developers make and an unwavering respect for their creative vision.

And that shows in the choices Knights Peak has made thus far. One of the strongest examples of the three pillars Vitale mentioned is Mandragora , a forthcoming gothic metroidvania soulslike RPG written by Vampire the Masquerade: Bloodlines ’ Brian Matsuda and inspired by Irish folklore. Knights Peak is dedicated to working with Primal Games to bring the game to life as part of a publishing partnership.

That kind of commitment to partnership is very personal to Vitale. His career from indie motocross developer to today has been marked with collaboration.

Why Vitale Being at the Helm is a Big Deal

Choosing Vitale for the job brought a lot of connections to Knights Peak’s fingertips. Vitale has worked with developers big and small, including Deep Silver and Mad Head. On top of that, his thirty years in the industry has given him a perspective on just what developers at any scale need for support from a publisher.

Starting a company in my early 20s was no easy feat, and while I had a clear vision of what I wanted to achieve, I have to admit that my people management skills left much to be desired initially. I am forever grateful to my early colleagues who helped me grow and improve. These experiences continue to inform my understanding of developers and the challenges they face in bringing their creations to life.

Vitale started The Dawn Interactive, working on motocross titles in 1994. He traveled all across Italy to recruit developers, starting with a team of three–with two working day jobs. Their team had to develop their own engine in MS-DOS, having started development before Windows 95 was even announced. From there, the team was able to release Extreme Trial Motocross in 1998. The small studio was able to sell 500,000 copies despite Vitale’s inexperience in marketing and publishing at the time.

He continued to work with motocross, partnering with publishers and champions of the sport and honing his talents, both as an indie developer wearing multiple hats and as a marketer and publisher. Now, he’s supporting people in the position he was in as a younger developer, and providing those resources to the teams that partner with Knights Peak.

Putting Experience Into Practice

Now the Vice-President of Publishing at Knights Peak, Vitale can directly apply his background to the kind of brand that MY.GAMES’ new label wants to be. His expertise with building connections, working at multiple levels of development, and getting resources where they need to be is critical to a good publisher.

And he’s built both his team and Knights Peak’s catalogue to get that relationship with the broader industry off to a strong start. To no small extent, Knights Peak is the fruit of Vitale’s labor - though he humbly attributes the starting position of the label to good fortune.

I've had the privilege of driving our publishing agreements and assembling the Knights Peak publishing team, strategy, and operations. Luck was on my side as I found incredibly experienced colleagues who are helping us become the publisher we aspire to be. Our catalogue currently includes five games: Starship Troopers: Extermination , Nikoderiko , Mandragora , Pathfinder: Kingmaker , and Blast Brigade , with more to come.

From this foundation, Knights Peak is eager to expand this catalogue in the future, though Vitale isn’t losing sight of the partnerships that the label has already formed. He gave those partners his heartfelt thanks for having faith in Knights Peak as a publisher. He also directed those interested in Knights Peak’s future to turn their eyes to Gamescom, which the team is putting a lot of energy into, in late August.

item.title: Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact DLC Wishlist
item.description:
Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact has finally revealed its launch roster in full. The game had previously faced concerns about the size of its roster, but the selections have been diverse enough to largely make up for it. However, there are still a few notable characters missing. In fact, some of these inclusions are so obvious that a DLC announcement for Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact seems more likely than ever.

Nen x Impact 's launch roster has already begun to exceed expectations. While the roster remains small, the makeup of characters included provides a stark contrast from its initial reveal. Rather than focusing on characters who may lend themselves better to a traditional fighting game, the roster embraces Hunter x Hunter 's wide array of creative fighters, and potential DLC should definitely follow this trend.

Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact's Best Potential DLC Characters

Unique Hunter x Hunter Characters Who Would Be Perfect for Nen x Impact DLC

Ging Freecss is one of the most important and powerful characters in Hunter x Hunter , and his role as Gon's deadbeat dad should make that clear enough. Likewise, Ging is a genius of Nen, and has shown himself to be capable of copying others' abilities, and using them to an even greater extent than they could. Though he has only demonstrated this with Leorio's ability so far, developers could use other members of the roster to give Ging a composite moveset that lets him fully stand out from the crowd he borrows from.

Prince Tserriednich is the presumptive main villain of the Succession Contest Arc, and has incredible potential as a playable character in Nen x Impact . Unfortunately, the roster trends towards excluding characters not yet featured in the Hunter x Hunter anime. Despite this, Tserriednich's prominence alone should put him in consideration, and his ability to alter the future would make him a formidable fighter.

Alluka is Killua's younger sister and a member of the Zoldyck family of assassins. Thanks to her alter ego Nanika, she has an ability so esoteric that it'd easily provide the most unique design in the entire game. This unfortunately makes her inclusion somewhat of a challenge for developers, even as DLC. On that note, Alluka is by no means a combatant, though that hasn't stopped Leorio yet.

Major Hunter x Hunter Snubs Make Nen x Impact DLC Seem More Likely

Illumi seemed like a given to make it into the game, especially as a member of both the Zoldyck family and the Phantom Troupe. The so-called Needle People he manipulates with his Nen ability could provide an interesting playstyle, though it may conflict with other members of the roster, such as Morel or Razor.

Any member of the Chimera Ant Royal Guard would've been a natural inclusion, especially Neferpitou. Shaiapouf and Menthuthuyoupi would certainly be worthy inclusions, and the latter is even referenced in Meruem's moveset. However, Pitou's role in the series is unmatched by her counterparts, with her fighting style fitting much more comfortably into a fast-paced fighter like Nen x Impact .

Another character that has seemingly been snubbed is Knuckle, a key member of the squad assembled to exterminate the Chimera Ants. Even his partners on the squad, Shoot and Palm, would provide a lot of value to the roster. Palm's role as a heroic Chimera Ant would make her especially interesting. However, Knuckle's debt-based Nen ability sets him apart from the brawlers that are already on the roster.

Hunter x Hunter's Launch Roster is in Great Shape

The disappointment created by certain snubs does not measure up to the excitement that many recent announcements have created. Not only does the game appear more polished than when it was revealed, but the final character reveals have restored a lot of confidence in the diversity of the roster. At this point, certain characters being left out makes their eventual inclusion more likely, not less.

Within the highly competitive shonen genre, Hunter x Hunter has always stood out for the depth of its fights and characters alike. Hunter x Hunter: Nen x Impact has made its voice heard among other upcoming anime fighters. It would be wise to maintain this momentum by announcing and releasing DLC characters that take full advantage of the series' best traits.

item.title: Temple Of Shadows Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
Temple Of Shadows is a mobile game based on the Naruto anime. It has fairly simple gameplay, but it is very enjoyable and addictive. This is an auto-battler where all players have to do is upgrade their ninjas and unlock new ones. The game is very generous from the very beginning and fans will quickly get plenty of fighters, the first of which will be Naruto. Nevertheless, it is possible to accelerate progress by entering several Temple Of Shadows codes. Using them, users will receive a lot of currency to upgrade their ninjas, as well as tickets to unlock new ones.

Updated August 1, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Unfortunately, the developers have not added any new codes yet. However, you can come back later and maybe the developers will release some freebies.

All Temple Of Shadows Codes

Below, players will find all the active codes for Temple Of Shadows . By redeeming these codes, they can get both various game currencies and tickets that will allow them to get the best ninjas.

Codes Checked on August 1, 2024.

Active Temple Of Shadows Codes

  • SHINOBI3RD1 - Enter this code to get 10 Premium Summon Tickets.
  • SHINOBI3RD2 - Enter this code to get 3 Elements Summon Tickets, and 10 Premium Summon Tickets.
  • SHINOBI3RD3 - Enter this code to get 5-Star Optional Nin-Soul Pack, 3 Elements Summon Tickets, and 10 Premium Summon Tickets.
  • SASUKE777 - Enter this code to get 5 Premium Summon Tickets and 200 Gold.
  • Naruto111 - Enter this code to get 100 Raffle Tickets and 100 Basic Summon Tickets.
  • HOKAGE123 - Enter this code to get 100 Tier-up Orbs, 10 Missions Square Refresh Tickets, and 100 Basic Summon Tickets.
  • SUSANO123 - Enter this code to get 10 Missions Square Refresh Tickets and 200 Gold.
  • DISCORD123 - Enter this code to get 100 Tier-up Orbs, 300 Gold, and 1 Premium Summon Ticket.
  • KAGE999 - Enter this code to get 100 Tier-up Orbs, 10 Missions Square Refresh Tickets, and 100 Basic Summon Tickets.
  • KURAMA99 - Enter this code to get 100 Basic Summon Tickets.
  • CHAKRA77 - Enter this code to get 100 Raffle Tickets and 100 Basic Summon Tickets.
  • CHIDORI77 - Enter this code to get 100 Raffle Tickets and 100 Basic Summon Tickets.
  • KONOHA333 - Enter this code to get 20 Missions Square Refresh Tickets, 200 Gold, and 10,000 Silver.
  • MITSUKI789 - Enter this code to get 100 Golds and 10 Missions Square Refresh Tickets.
  • MOMOSHIKI - Enter this code to get 100 Gold and 2 Premium Summon Tickets.

All Expired Temple Of Shadows Codes

  • Kurenai2403
  • Shizune0202
  • Karin1212
  • Susanoo2311
  • Haku2310
  • Tsunade0840

How to Redeem Codes in Temple Of Shadows

In Temple Of Shadows , users can redeem codes in the same way as in other similar mobile games. However, if players are unfamiliar with such games, they can use the instructions below:

  • Launch Temple Of Shadows .
  • In the upper-left corner, there is an avatar icon. Click on it.
  • An interface with 7 black buttons will open. Press the Redeem button with a gift drawn on it.
  • A field will open where players have to enter or paste the code.
  • Press Redeem.

Temple Of Shadows is now available on Android.

item.title: Legend of Slime Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
Legend of Slime is a cute, simple, yet addictive idle RPG with a bunch of mechanics that will grab your attention for hours, maybe even days. In many games, slimes are the weakest enemies, being the initial ones, but Legend of Slime breaks all the standards. Here, the slime plays the protagonist's role, fighting against evil people who rise up on the way. Throughout the game, you'll need to level up your slime, get new weapons, armor, and even companions, but all of this requires Gems, the local premium currency. By redeeming Legend of Slime codes, you'll get a bunch of Gems, which will be enough to properly equip your character, especially if you're a beginner.

Updated August 1, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: We are always happy to share new codes, but it appears that the developers have not added any new yet. Stay tuned for future updates.

All Legend of Slime Codes

Even without an excessive amount of Gems, the game is easy and fast, but getting new cool equipment or companions is also nice, especially since it gives a good advantages. Manually accumulating currency can be a bit time-consuming, so the best method is to redeem Legend of Slime codes, which will bring you tons of Gems in seconds.

Working Legend of Slime Codes

  • WELCOME - Redeem this code to get 5,000 Gems.
  • URBACK - Redeem this code to get 10,000 Gems.

Expired Legend of Slime Codes

  • SLIMESLIKEHOTNOODLES
  • APPQUANTUM
  • 1eb9d966a2d286c2
  • 9b6ce1893791c34b
  • D220D576590742F4
  • 3402E62AB77AC379
  • CUTDZ
  • BSMAS
  • EB95EE09FE225B15
  • F6C7C63C07DDDE3A
  • 1A6D214B3D87F9F6
  • 019707E987C74A42
  • 2EA55FFA9561F786
  • F6C7C63C07DDDE3A
  • 37E28C5D19DEBB43
  • 419F0576C9248129
  • SWALLOW_SLIME
  • MARRIED_SLIME_0601
  • GOLDENWEEK
  • LOS_0327
  • LEGENDSLIME2023

How to Redeem Codes for Legend of Slime

Redemption of Legend of Slime codes is easy and quick but will be available only after completing a short tutorial. If you have never redeemed Legend of Slime codes before, follow the instructions below to understand how to do it:

  • Go to the Home screen.
  • Pay attention to the upper right corner of the screen. There will be a button with three dashes and dots. Click on it.
  • This will open a drop-down menu. Here, find and interact with the Settings button. It's the second one on the list.
  • In the Settings menu, pay attention to the bottom section. There will be a button labeled Coupon. Click on it.
  • This will open the redemption menu, which has only three options, an input field, and two buttons: Cancel and OK. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the OK button to submit the reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification on the screen listing the rewards you have received.

Legend of Slime is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Roblox: Evade Codes (August 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Evade Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Evade
  • How to Play Evade
  • Best Roblox Horror Games Like Evade
  • About the Evade Developers

Dodging enemies and surviving as long as possible is what Evade is all about. This article will teach Roblox players how to redeem Evade codes to receive a wide variety of in-game goodies that will help give them an edge over the competition. However, Roblox players should be sure to do so as soon as possible, as it is unknown how long these codes are going to remain active.

Updated August 1, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: This article has been updated to reflect current information. Check back later to stay tuned.

All Evade Codes

Roblox players looking to get some tokens, experience, and cosmetics to enhance their playtime can use the following Evade codes. They'll expire at random intervals, though, so be sure to redeem them as soon as they become available. As is the case in most other popular Roblox games, codes can only be redeemed once per account.

Working Evade Codes

  • 444 - Redeem for 444 Tokens!
  • 222 - Redeem for 222 Tokens!
  • therealdeal - Redeem for a free Bird Badge cosmetic!

Expired Evade Codes

  • luckyday - Redeem for four clover pins!
  • NewYears2023 - Redeem for a New Year Cosmetic!
  • HolidayUpdateFix - Redeem for 2k Tokens!
  • HolidayUpdateFixEXP - Redeem for 300 XP!
  • 1bill - Redeem for a free 1B Celebration cosmetic!
  • Evade1K - Unknown Reward.

How to Redeem Codes in Evade

Redeeming codes in Evade is relatively straightforward, with players simply needing to follow a few steps. If a code doesn't work, they should make sure they entered it correctly and try again. If it still doesn't work after this, it could mean that the code has recently expired or has already been redeemed by the player.

  1. Launch Evade
  2. Press the Twitter icon located in the bottom left corner of the screen
  3. Paste the code into the text field
  4. Press Redeem to collect the rewards

How to Play Evade

Evade is a survival game. Players have to choose one of the many modes in the game. When the round starts, they have to constantly move and avoid various dangers. The game has very interesting physics mechanics, and knowing how to take advantage of this can be very important for survival. The player who can survive the longest wins.

Best Roblox Horror Games Like Evade

When a game gets boring, it's time to look for another one. This is a rather difficult task, since among many monotonous games it is necessary to look for a high-quality project. But, this is no longer a problem because in this article, players will find 5 high-quality games like Evade :

  • Color or Die
  • DOORS
  • ELMIRA
  • BEWILDERED
  • 3008

About the Evade Developers

The developers from Hexagon Development Community have been working on Evade for a long time and their efforts have not been in vain as the game has already collected more than 1 million likes. These developers also have another equally cool game - Tower Blitz .
